entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
